title: Compliance with non-proliferation, arms limitation and disarmament agreements and commitments
text:
United Nations 
A/C.1/80/L.63 
 
 
General Assembly 
Distr.: Limited 
16 October 2025 
Original: English 
 
25-16816 (E)    221025 
*2516816* 
 
 
Eightieth session 
First Committee 
Agenda item 99 (aa) 
General and complete disarmament: compliance with 
non-proliferation, arms limitation and disarmament 
agreements and commitments 
 
 
 
 
 
United States of America: draft decision 
 
 
 
 Compliance with non-proliferation, arms limitation and 
disarmament agreements and commitments 
 
 
 
The General Assembly, recalling its resolutions 76/33 of 6 December 2021, 
72/32 of 4 December 2017, 69/59 of 2 December 2014, 66/49 of 2 December 2011, 
63/59 of 2 December 2008 and 60/55 of 8 December 2005 and its decision 79/515 of 
2 December 2024, decides to include in the provisional agenda of its eighty-first 
session, under the item entitled “General and complete disarmament”, the sub-item 
entitled “Compliance with non-proliferation, arms limitation and disarmament 
agreements and commitments”.
